statements: SELECT * FROM driver_information;
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM driver_information;
SELECT driver_name, license_expiry_date FROM driver_information;
SELECT driver_name, certification_name FROM driver_information;
SELECT driver_name FROM driver_information WHERE license_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM driver_information WHERE certification_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT driver_name, certification_name FROM driver_information WHERE license_number LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM driver_information WHERE certification_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT driver_name, certification_date FROM driver_information WHERE license_expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT driver_name, license_expiry_date FROM driver_information WHERE certification_name = 'First Aid';
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM driver_information WHERE certification_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT driver_name, license_expiry_date FROM driver_information WHERE license_expiry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT driver_name, certification_date FROM driver_information ORDER BY certification_date ASC;
SELECT driver_name, license_expiry_date FROM driver_information ORDER BY license_expiry_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT certification_name FROM driver_information;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM driver_information;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(license_expiry_date, certification_date)) AS avg_duration FROM driver_information;
SELECT SUM(DATEDIFF(license_expiry_date, certification_date)) AS total_duration FROM driver_information;
SELECT MAX(DATEDIFF(license_expiry_date, certification_date)) AS max_duration FROM driver_information;
SELECT MIN(DATEDIFF(license_expiry_date, certification_date)) AS min_duration FROM driver_information;
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM driver_information WHERE certification_name = 'CDL' AND certification_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM driver_information WHERE license_expiry_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT driver_name, license_number, certification_name FROM driver_information WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM driver_information WHERE license_expiry_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY certification_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM driver_information
SELECT DISTINCT certification_name FROM driver_information
SELECT driver_name FROM driver_information WHERE license_number LIKE '%ABC%'
SELECT driver_name, certification_name FROM driver_information WHERE license_expiry_date > '2022-12-31' AND license_expiry_date < '2023-12-31'
SELECT driver_name, certification_name FROM driver_information WHERE certification_name IN ('CDL', 'Forklift')
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(certification_date, license_expiry_date)) AS average_days FROM driver_information
SELECT driver_name, license_expiry_date FROM driver_information WHERE certification_name = 'CDL' OR certification_name = 'Bus Driver'
SELECT driver_name, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM driver_information GROUP BY driver_name
SELECT * FROM driver_information WHERE license_expiry_date < NOW()
SELECT driver_id, certification_date FROM driver_information WHERE license_number LIKE '%XYZ%' AND certification_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT driver_name, certification_name FROM driver_information WHERE certification_date = (SELECT MAX(certification_date) FROM driver_information)
SELECT driver_name FROM driver_information WHERE YEAR(license_expiry_date) = 2022
SELECT certification_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM driver_information GROUP BY certification_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM driver_information WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM license_expiry_date) = 12
SELECT * FROM driver_information WHERE license_expiry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01'
SELECT driver_name, certification_name FROM driver_information WHERE certification_date = (SELECT MIN(certification_date) FROM driver_information)
SELECT driver_id, driver_name FROM drivers;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_id, license_number FROM drivers;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name FROM certifications;
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_expiry_date FROM certifications;
SELECT driver_id, certification_name, certification_expiry_date FROM certifications;
SELECT drivers.driver_id, drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT drivers.driver_id, drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers LEFT JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT drivers.driver_id, drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers RIGHT JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT drivers.driver_id, drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers INNER JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;

SELECT drivers.driver_id, drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id WHERE certifications.certification_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT drivers.driver_id, drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id ORDER BY certifications.certification_expiry_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(driver_id) FROM drivers;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drivers;
SELECT MAX(driver_id) FROM drivers;
SELECT MIN(driver_id) FROM drivers;
SELECT SUM(driver_id) FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, COUNT(certifications.certification_id) FROM drivers LEFT JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id GROUP BY driver_name;
SELECT driver_name, MAX(certifications.certification_expiry_date) FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id GROUP BY driver_name;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, license_expiry_date FROM drivers;
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_expiry_date FROM certifications;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers LEFT JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers RIGHT JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;

SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id WHERE certifications.certification_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id GROUP BY drivers.driver_name;

SELECT drivers.driver_name, COUNT(certifications.certification_name) AS certification_count FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id GROUP BY drivers.driver_name;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id ORDER BY drivers.driver_name;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id LIMIT 10;

SELECT drivers.driver_name, SUM(certifications.certification_expiry_date - drivers.license_expiry_date) AS expiration_difference FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id GROUP BY drivers.driver_name;
SELECT DISTINCT drivers.driver_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id HAVING COUNT(certifications.certification_name) > 1;

SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id UNION SELECT driver_name, 'No certification' AS certification_name FROM drivers WHERE driver_id NOT IN (SELECT driver_id FROM certifications);

SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id INTERSECT SELECT driver_name, 'Driver' AS certification_name FROM drivers;

SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id EXCEPT SELECT driver_name, 'Driver' AS certification_name FROM drivers;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY;
SELECT * FROM driver_information;
SELECT name, license_number, license_expiry_date FROM driver_information;
SELECT * FROM driver_licenses;
SELECT license_number, issue_date, expiry_date FROM driver_licenses;
SELECT * FROM driver_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM driver_certifications;
SELECT name, license_type FROM driver_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT license_number, issue_date FROM driver_licenses WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name FROM driver_certifications WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM driver_information WHERE license_expiry_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM driver_licenses WHERE expiry_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM driver_certifications WHERE certification_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT name FROM driver_information ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT license_number FROM driver_licenses ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name FROM driver_certifications ORDER BY certification_date ASC;
SELECT name, license_expiry_date FROM driver_information WHERE license_type = 'Car';
SELECT license_number, issue_date FROM driver_licenses WHERE license_type = 'Motorcycle';
SELECT certification_name FROM driver_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01' AND certification_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_drivers FROM driver_information;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(expiry_date, issue_date)) AS average_license_duration FROM driver_licenses;
SELECT * FROM driver_information WHERE license_type = 'Class A' AND license_expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT name, license_type FROM driver_information WHERE license_expiry_date < NOW();
SELECT driver_id, license_number, license_type FROM driver_licenses WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM driver_certifications WHERE certification_date = '2022-12-25';

SELECT d.name, dl.license_number, dc.certification_name FROM driver_information d JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id JOIN driver_certifications dc ON d.id = dc.driver_id WHERE dl.expiry_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT d.name, dc.certification_name FROM driver_information d JOIN driver_certifications dc ON d.id = dc.driver_id WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM driver_licenses dl WHERE dl.driver_id = d.id AND dl.issue_date > '2022-01-01');

SELECT d.name, dl.license_type, dc.certification_name FROM driver_information d INNER JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id INNER JOIN driver_certifications dc ON d.id = dc.driver_id WHERE dl.expiry_date < '2023-01-01' OR dc.certification_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT d.name, COUNT(dc.certification_id) AS num_certifications FROM driver_information d LEFT JOIN driver_certifications dc ON d.id = dc.driver_id GROUP BY d.name HAVING COUNT(dc.certification_id) > 1;
SELECT d.name, AVG(DATEDIFF(dl.expiry_date, dl.issue_date)) AS avg_license_duration FROM driver_information d INNER JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id GROUP BY d.name;
SELECT d.name, MAX(DATEDIFF(dl.expiry_date, dl.issue_date)) AS max_license_duration FROM driver_information d INNER JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id GROUP BY d.name;

SELECT d.name, license_number, CASE WHEN license_type = 'Class A' THEN 'Commercial' ELSE 'Non-Commercial' END AS license_category FROM driver_information d JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id;

SELECT d.name, license_number, certification_name FROM driver_information d JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id LEFT JOIN driver_certifications dc ON d.id = dc.driver_id WHERE dl.issue_date > '2022-01-01' AND dc.certification_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT d.name, license_number, certification_name FROM driver_information d JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id LEFT JOIN driver_certifications dc ON d.id = dc.driver_id WHERE dl.issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND dc.certification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT d.name, license_number, dc.certification_name FROM driver_information d JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id LEFT JOIN driver_certifications dc ON d.id = dc.driver_id WHERE dl.expiry_date > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY);
SELECT d.name, license_number FROM driver_information d LEFT JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id WHERE dl.license_type IS NULL;
SELECT d.name, dl.license_number FROM driver_information d RIGHT JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id WHERE d.id IS NULL;
SELECT d.name, dl.license_number FROM driver_information d RIGHT JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id WHERE d.name IS NULL;
SELECT d.name, license_number FROM driver_information d FULL JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id WHERE d.name IS NULL OR dl.driver_id IS NULL;
SELECT d.name, dl.license_number FROM driver_information d INNER JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM driver_certifications dc WHERE dc.driver_id = d.id);

SELECT d.name, dl.license_number, dc.certification_name FROM driver_information d INNER JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id LEFT JOIN driver_certifications dc ON d.id = dc.driver_id WHERE dc.certification_date IS NULL;

SELECT d.name, dl.license_number, dc.certification_name FROM driver_information d LEFT JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.id = dl.driver_id LEFT JOIN driver_certifications dc ON d.id = dc.driver_id WHERE d.id NOT IN (SELECT driver_id FROM driver_certifications);
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, license_expiry_date FROM drivers WHERE certification = 'CDL';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM driver_licenses;
SELECT driver_id, license_type, issue_date FROM driver_licenses WHERE license_type = 'CDL';
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT driver_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM certifications WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT d.driver_name, v.make, v.year FROM drivers d INNER JOIN vehicles v ON d.driver_id = v.vehicle_id;
SELECT d.driver_name, dl.license_number, c.certification_name FROM drivers d INNER JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.driver_id = dl.driver_id INNER JOIN certifications c ON d.driver_id = c.driver_id;
SELECT driver_id, COUNT(*) AS total_licenses FROM driver_licenses GROUP BY driver_id;
SELECT driver_id, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM certifications GROUP BY driver_id;
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT SUM(year) AS total_years FROM vehicles;
SELECT AVG(year) AS average_year FROM vehicles;
SELECT driver_name, COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM drivers d INNER JOIN vehicles v ON d.driver_id = v.vehicle_id GROUP BY d.driver_id;
SELECT driver_id, license_type, YEAR(issue_date) AS issue_year FROM driver_licenses;
SELECT certification_name, COUNT(*) AS total_drivers FROM certifications GROUP BY certification_name;
SELECT driver_name, license_number, license_type, issue_date FROM drivers d INNER JOIN driver_licenses dl ON d.driver_id = dl.driver_id WHERE dl.license_type = 'CDL';
SELECT driver_id, license_type, issue_date FROM driver_licenses ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Ford' AND year > 2015;
SELECT driver_name, license_number, license_expiry_date FROM drivers WHERE certification = 'CDL';
SELECT * FROM drivers JOIN driver_licenses ON drivers.driver_id = driver_licenses.driver_id WHERE license_type = 'CDL';
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id IN (SELECT driver_id FROM driver_licenses WHERE issue_date > '2020-01-01');
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_drivers FROM drivers;
SELECT MAX(year) AS latest_year FROM vehicles;
SELECT driver_name, certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT make, model, driver_name FROM vehicles JOIN drivers ON vehicles.vehicle_id = drivers.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id NOT IN (SELECT driver_id FROM certifications WHERE expiry_date < '2022-01-01');
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id IN (SELECT driver_id FROM driver_licenses WHERE license_type = 'CDL' AND issue_date > '2020-01-01');
SELECT driver_name, COUNT(*) AS total_licenses FROM drivers JOIN driver_licenses ON drivers.driver_id = driver_licenses.driver_id GROUP BY driver_name;
SELECT certification_name, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM certifications GROUP BY certification_name;
SELECT driver_name, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id GROUP BY driver_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT make, COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM vehicles GROUP BY make;
SELECT certification_name, MAX(certification_date) AS latest_cert_date FROM certifications GROUP BY certification_name;
SELECT driver_name, MAX(expiry_date) AS latest_expiry FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id GROUP BY driver_name;
SELECT driver_name, AVG(year) AS avg_vehicle_year FROM drivers JOIN vehicles ON drivers.driver_id = vehicles.vehicle_id GROUP BY driver_name;
SELECT driver_name, AVG(issue_date) AS avg_license_issue_date FROM drivers JOIN driver_licenses ON drivers.driver_id = driver_licenses.driver_id GROUP BY driver_name;
SELECT driver_name, MIN(year) AS oldest_vehicle_year FROM drivers JOIN vehicles ON drivers.driver_id = vehicles.vehicle_id GROUP BY driver_name;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM driver_licenses;
SELECT license_type FROM driver_licenses WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name FROM certifications;
SELECT vehicle_plate_number FROM vehicle_registry WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT incident_description FROM incidents WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drivers JOIN driver_licenses ON drivers.driver_id = driver_licenses.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM drivers INNER JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM drivers LEFT JOIN vehicle_registry ON drivers.driver_id = vehicle_registry.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM driver_licenses JOIN certifications ON driver_licenses.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT driver_name, license_type FROM drivers JOIN driver_licenses ON drivers.driver_id = driver_licenses.driver_id;
SELECT driver_name, certification_name FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT driver_name, vehicle_plate_number FROM drivers LEFT JOIN vehicle_registry ON drivers.driver_id = vehicle_registry.driver_id;

SELECT driver_name, license_type, certification_name FROM drivers JOIN driver_licenses ON drivers.driver_id = driver_licenses.driver_id JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;

SELECT driver_name, license_type, certification_name FROM drivers JOIN driver_licenses ON drivers.driver_id = driver_licenses.driver_id JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id WHERE driver_id = 1;

SELECT driver_name, certification_name, vehicle_plate_number FROM drivers JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id LEFT JOIN vehicle_registry ON drivers.driver_id = vehicle_registry.driver_id WHERE drivers.driver_id = 1;
SELECT driver_name, driver_license_number, incident_description FROM drivers JOIN incidents ON drivers.driver_id = incidents.driver_id WHERE drivers.driver_id = 1;
SELECT driver_name AS name, driver_license_number AS license, incident_description AS incident FROM drivers JOIN incidents ON drivers.driver_id = incidents.driver_id WHERE drivers.driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, driver_licenses.license_type FROM drivers INNER JOIN driver_licenses ON drivers.driver_id = driver_licenses.driver_id;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers INNER JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, vehicle_registry.vehicle_plate_number FROM drivers INNER JOIN vehicle_registry ON drivers.driver_id = vehicle_registry.driver_id;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, incidents.incident_description FROM drivers INNER JOIN incidents ON drivers.driver_id = incidents.driver_id;

SELECT drivers.driver_name, driver_licenses.license_type, certifications.certification_name FROM drivers INNER JOIN driver_licenses ON drivers.driver_id = driver_licenses.driver_id INNER JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;

SELECT drivers.driver_name, driver_licenses.license_type, vehicle_registry.vehicle_plate_number FROM drivers INNER JOIN driver_licenses ON drivers.driver_id = driver_licenses.driver_id INNER JOIN vehicle_registry ON drivers.driver_id = vehicle_registry.driver_id;

SELECT drivers.driver_name, certifications.certification_name, incidents.incident_description FROM drivers INNER JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id INNER JOIN incidents ON drivers.driver_id = incidents.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM driver_licenses;
SELECT driver_licenses.license_type, certifications.certification_name FROM driver_licenses INNER JOIN certifications ON driver_licenses.driver_id = certifications.driver_id;
SELECT driver_licenses.license_type, vehicle_registry.vehicle_plate_number FROM driver_licenses INNER JOIN vehicle_registry ON driver_licenses.driver_id = vehicle_registry.driver_id;
SELECT driver_licenses.license_type, incidents.incident_description FROM driver_licenses INNER JOIN incidents ON driver_licenses.driver_id = incidents.driver_id;

SELECT driver_licenses.license_type, certifications.certification_name, vehicle_registry.vehicle_plate_number FROM driver_licenses INNER JOIN certifications ON driver_licenses.driver_id = certifications.driver_id INNER JOIN vehicle_registry ON driver_licenses.driver_id = vehicle_registry.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certifications.certification_name, vehicle_registry.vehicle_plate_number FROM certifications INNER JOIN vehicle_registry ON certifications.driver_id = vehicle_registry.driver_id;
SELECT certifications.certification_name, incidents.incident_description FROM certifications INNER JOIN incidents ON certifications.driver_id = incidents.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_registry;
SELECT vehicle_registry.vehicle_plate_number, incidents.incident_description FROM vehicle_registry INNER JOIN incidents ON vehicle_registry.driver_id = incidents.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM incidents;

SELECT drivers.driver_name, driver_licenses.license_type, certifications.certification_name, vehicle_registry.vehicle_plate_number, incidents.incident_description FROM drivers INNER JOIN driver_licenses ON drivers.driver_id = driver_licenses.driver_id INNER JOIN certifications ON drivers.driver_id = certifications.driver_id INNER JOIN vehicle_registry ON drivers.driver_id = vehicle_registry.driver_id INNER JOIN incidents ON drivers.driver_id = incidents.driver_id;
